媔字的基本解释

媔
mián
（眼睛）美：“美目媔只。”

媔
miǎn
妬忌：“阏氏妇女有妒媔之性。”

媔字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mián］
［《集韻》彌延切，平，明。］
目美貌。
[②]［miǎn］
［《集韻》彌袞切，上，明。］
忌妒。

媔字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　媔； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页266第40
【集韻】彌延切，音綿。目美貌。【楚辭·大招】靑色直眉，美目媔只。　又彌兗切，音緬。妒也。

媔字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
媔字的起名意思

指美目。

媔
Basic explanation of words
媔
mián
(Eyes) Mei: "Beautiful eyes are only."
媔
miǎn
Jealousy: "Women of the Yan family are jealous."
媔
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［mián］
["Jiyun" is extended and cut, flat, Ming. ]
Beautiful eyes.
[②]［miǎn］
["Ji Yun" Mi Dagon cut, upper , Ming. ]
Jealous.
媔
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 2] [Female Character Department] 　媔; Kangxi strokes: 12; Page number: page 266 to 40
[Jiyun] extended cut, sound cotton. Beautiful eyes. [Songs of the South · Big Move] Straight eyebrows, beautiful eyes.　Cut again and again, sound Burmese. Jealous too.
媔

Name meaning
Refers to beautiful eyes.
